title: About
text: Zane is a student at California State University Monterey Bay studying Accounting with a minor in Data Science. Their academic work on this site focuses on combining quantitative analysis with clear communication, using tools such as R and Quarto to explore, analyze, and present data in a reproducible and accessible way. Through coursework and projects, Zane has developed experience in data visualization, statistical analysis, and structured reporting, with an emphasis on clarity, accuracy, and usability. This portfolio highlights selected projects that demonstrate their technical skills, analytical approach, and interest in using data to understand real world patterns and support informed decision making.

title: Zane Sano
text: Zane Sano is a multidisciplinary designer and accounting student based in California, with experience spanning graphic design, branding, social media management, and client-facing roles. They are currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Accounting at California State University, Monterey Bay, while bringing a strong creative and technical background into their academic and analytical work.

title: Zane Sano
text:
Experience
 Asakito Creative Studio | Graphic Design Artist | 2022 – Present 
Owner of a self-employed freelance firm specializing in brand identity development, brand content creation, and website design and refreshment. Responsibilities include designing logo systems, visual style guides, illustrated infographics, digital and print assets, and full social media campaigns. Works closely with clients through all stages of website design, including wireframing, UI and UX design, and modernization.
Éire Óg Gaelic Football Club | Social Media Manager | Mar 2024 – Sept 2024
Managed content creation and platform strategy for a men’s Gaelic football team. Developed and executed a community engagement strategy that increased local involvement and event attendance. Maintained direct communication with team members, supporters, and community organizations, and provided individualized outreach to new participants.
Zoom Room Dog Training | Dog Trainer | June 2017 – Jan 2020
Handled customer inquiries and conflict resolution across in-person and digital channels. Led daily group orientations and contributed to office management improvements that increased organizational efficiency and client satisfaction.
